roleset.name: give up (eg, a fight)
roleset.note: SURRENDER-V NOTES: There are actually two very different senses, but the syntax iscompatible so we'll leave it as one roleset. (from surrender.01-v)
SURRENDER-N NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Comparison to surrender.01. VN class contribute-13.2-1-1. Framed by Katie. (from surrender.01-n)

example.name: unstated fight
example.text: Last week, Robert M. Bradley, one of the Big Board's most respected floor traders and head of a major traders' organization, surrendered.
example.arg: Robert M. Bradley, one of the Big Board's most respected floor traders and head of a major traders' organization,

example.name: with stated fight
example.text: Some European analysts speculated that [officials of Saab's highly profitable Scania truck operation]-1 balked at *trace*-1 surrendering any of their autonomy.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: The former governor of Basra Province also surrendered to coalition forces today .
example.arg: The former governor of Basra Province

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: In autumn last year , for example , the regime garrison at Kandahar was prepared to surrender the city to resistance moderates .
